name: XRP CLASSIC from Ethereum
description: Bridged from Ethereum via https://bridge.pulsechain.com. Original Address - 0xd4cA5c2AFf1eeFb0BeA9e9Eab16f88DB2990C183. XRP CLASSIC presents a decentralized accessible blockchain and cryptocurrency infrastructure; it is absolutely open source content management system. XRP CLASSIC is promoting a smart contract platform, the main goal of which is to provide the most progressive properties no other platform is able to offer right now.
